sentences.sContent: We must redefine what constitutes a family.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须对家庭的构成重新定义。

sentences.sContent: ...The traditional view of such moments is that they constitute a charming but irrelevant byproduct ofyouth-something to be pushed aside to make room for more important qualities...

remMethod.val: con(表加强) ＋ stitut(建立， 放)+e→ 设立

words.tran: 基本的；本质的；制定的；构成分子的
立宪；立宪主义，立宪制度

trans.tranCn: 组成， 形成； 设立； 任命
trans.tranOther: if several people or things constitute something, they are the parts that form it
